Dear Mr. Skornia,
gadio~Lausanne - Italia Prize 1955
We are handing you herewith, for your information, copy
of our to-day!s letter to Mr. Henry Brant, in connection with
the broadcasting by Radio-Lausanne on 15th ult., of his work
"DECEMBER”, which won the Italia Prize this year.
Sincerely yours,
(.
(Gian Carlo Pellandini)
